text: Ani lokanna tya divasapasuna savadha kara jevha tyancyajavala azaba (siksa-yatana) ye'una pohocela ani atyacari loka mhanatila ki he amacya palanakartya! Amhala phara thodya javalacya veleparyantaca sandhi pradana kara ki amhi tujhe nimantrana (davata) man'ya karave ani tujhya paigambarancya anusaranata magna vhave. Kaya tumhi yacya purvihi sapatha gheta navhate ki tumhala ya jagatuna talayaceca nahi
